op.title: #Op Face.Book
op.description: Facebook, you have started to censor our accounts for no reason. The time has come to stop. This is the real AnonOp that will put a stop to the censorship on Facebook. All other operations have had their time, this is the one that will take action. Prepare for battle FB.

op.title: #Op Sopa
op.description: We will not stand and watch as you slowly take away our rights to free speech. We WILL FIGHT YOU tooth and nail and we will show no mercy. If you pass this bill, you will pay for it! Expect us.

op.title: #Op BanksBoicot
op.description: Revolution! on 12/07 let's go everybody to withdraw our money! I call for a Boycott of all BIG Banks Wells Fargo. Citi Bank. Chase bank. JP Morgan Chase. Bank of America etc on December 7th 2012.
op.address: The idea starts in France, but it's taking place all over the world!

op.title: #Op Wall Street
op.description: TO EXPOSE the official lies and cover-up surrounding the events of September 11th, 2001 in a way that inspires the people to overcome denial and understand the truth; namely, that elements within the US government and covert policy apparatus must have orchestrated or participated in the execution of the attacks for these to have happened in the way that they did.
